label: Knight School Pool 3
description:
The unicorn walks up to the pool, and beholding his reflection, notice it shimmer a bit and the face of a handsome and regal looking Knight starts staring back for a brief moment, before returning to his own reflection.  
He recognizes it as the same as the statues face.
The unicorn then decides to head out.

Meanwhile John is trying to figure a way into Princess Prep...

Hit 1 to continue.

Hit 0 to quit.
